plugin.name: BidX
plugin.author: Aoric
plugin.purpose: Show auctioned item in miniwin or main window

muclient.triggers:
<trigger group="auction" name="bid_item_new" enabled="y" match="^Auction\: (?P\w+?) is (?P\w+?) (?P.+?) \(Level (?P\d+?)\, Num (?P\d+?)\)\. Current bid is (?P.+?)\.$" regexp="y" send_to="12" script="hlink_auc_item" omit_from_output="y" sequence="600" >
<trigger group="auction" name="bid_outbid" enabled="y" match="^Auction\: (?P\w+?) has placed a bid for (?P[\d,-]+?) (?P\w+?) on (?P.+?) \(Level (?P\d+?)\, Num (?P\d+?)\)\.$" regexp="y" send_to="12" script="hlink_auc_item" omit_from_output="y" sequence="600" >
<trigger group="auction" name="bid_list" enabled="y" match="^(?P.*\d+?)[ ]\-[ ](?P\w+?)(?:[ ]+)(?P.+?)(?:[ ]+)(?P\d+?)(?:[ ]+)(?P[\d,-]+?)(?:[ ]+)(?P.+?)$" regexp="y" send_to="12" script="hlink_auc_list" omit_from_output="y" sequence="600" >
<trigger group="auction" name="lbid_item_new" enabled="y" match="^Market\: (?P\w+?) is (?P\w+?) (?P.+?) \(Level (?P\d+?)\, Num (?P\d+?)\)\. Auction is for (?P\w+?)\.$" regexp="y" send_to="12" script="hlink_auc_item" omit_from_output="y" sequence="600" >
<trigger group="auction" name="lbid_outbid" enabled="y" match="^Market\: (?P\w+?) has[ ](proxy[ ]|)bid (?P[\d,-]+?) (?P\w+?) on (.+?) \(Level (?P\d+?)\, Num (?P\d+?)\)\.$" regexp="y" send_to="12" script="hlink_auc_item" omit_from_output="y" sequence="600" >
<trigger group="auction" name="lbid_item_last_min_notif" enabled="y" match="^Market\: Bid of (?P[\d,-]+?) (?P\w+?) on (?P.+) \(Level (?P\d+?)\, Num (?P\d+?)\)$" regexp="y" send_to="12" script="hlink_auc_item" omit_from_output="y" sequence="600" >
<trigger group="auction" name="lbid_list" enabled="y" match="^(?P.*\d+?)[ ](?P.+?)(?:[ ]+)(?P\d+?)(?:[ ]+)(?P\*Gold|Gold|Qp|Tp)(?:[ ]+)(?P[\d,-]+?)(?:[ ]+)(?P\d+?)(?:[ ]+)(?P.+?)$" regexp="y" send_to="12" script="hlink_auc_list" omit_from_output="y" sequence="600" >
-- do something?
if (tonumber(GetVariable("capture_start")) == 0) and (tonumber(GetVariable("start_auc_line")) == 0) then SetVariable("capture_start", 1)
EnableTrigger("auc_line", true) EnableTrigger("auc_body", true)
-- print("start capturing...")
elseif (tonumber(GetVariable("capture_start")) ~= 0) and (tonumber(GetVariable("start_auc_line")) ~= 0) then SetVariable("capture_start", 0) SetVariable("start_auc_line", 0)
EnableTrigger("auc_line", false) EnableTrigger("auc_body", false) EnableTrigger("auc_blank", false)
-- print("end capture!") end
SetVariable("start_auc_line", 1)
